item.title: Danswers 02/02/2015 - The Dantroduction
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: On the inaugural episode of Danswers, Dan Ryckert & Danny O'Dwyer dig into your questions about moving city, fast weddings, first kisses, social anxiety, and the role of fathers.
item.itunes:subtitle: On the inaugural episode of Danswers, Dan Ryckert & Danny O'Dwyer dig into your questions about moving city, fast weddings, first kisses, social anxiety, and the role of fathers.
item.itunes:summary: On the inaugural episode of Danswers, Dan Ryckert & Danny O'Dwyer dig into your questions about moving city, fast weddings, first kisses, social anxiety, and the role of fathers.

item.title: Danswers 02/09/2015 - Steely Danswers
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Dan & Dan are joined by special guest Jeff GerstDann, to talk about drinking the right amount of booze, family loss, confidence issues, impostor syndrome and anxious babies.
item.itunes:subtitle: Dan & Dan are joined by special guest Jeff GerstDann, to talk about drinking the right amount of booze, family loss, confidence issues, impostor syndrome and anxious babies.

item.title: Danswers 03: Dan the Man
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: This time on Danswers we take your questions on codependency, friends with guns, apartment hunting, anxious partners, hobby shame and living in cars.
item.itunes:subtitle: This time on Danswers we take your questions on codependency, friends with guns, apartment hunting, anxious partners, hobby shame and living in cars.
item.itunes:summary: This time on Danswers we take your questions on codependency, friends with guns, apartment hunting, anxious partners, hobby shame and living in cars.

item.title: Danswers 04: Nikki Glaser
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Stand-up comedian, TV personality and college friend of Dan Ryckert, Nikki Glaser joins us this week to talk about surrogacy, depression, fetishes, fainting at vaginas, and Dan losing his virginity.
item.itunes:subtitle: Stand-up comedian, TV personality and college friend of Dan Ryckert, Nikki Glaser joins us this week to talk about surrogacy, depression, fetishes, fainting at vaginas, and Dan losing his virginity.

item.title: Danswers 05: Samantha Kalman
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Indie developer Samantha Kalman joins us this week to Danswer your questions and and cover a variety of topics.
item.itunes:subtitle: Indie developer Samantha Kalman joins us this week to Danswer your questions and and cover a variety of topics.
item.itunes:summary: Indie developer Samantha Kalman joins us this week to Danswer your questions and and cover a variety of topics.

item.title: Danswers 06: Fitness with Danielle
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: The Danfecta is complete! Polygon's Danielle Riendeau joins us to chat about fitness, weight loss, diet, socializing and leaving the nest. Plus we launch the Danswercise E3 Challenge!
item.itunes:subtitle: The Danfecta is complete! Polygon's Danielle Riendeau joins us to chat about fitness, weight loss, diet, socializing and leaving the nest. Plus we launch the Danswercise E3 Challenge!

item.title: Danswers 07: Return of the Gerstdann
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Jeff joins the party of Dans to talk about everything from obsessive compulsive disorder, late blooming adulthood, getting fit, anxiety around death and running for Canadian congress.
item.itunes:subtitle: Jeff joins the party of Dans to talk about everything from obsessive compulsive disorder, late blooming adulthood, getting fit, anxiety around death and running for Canadian congress.

item.title: Danswers 08: Vinny Danavella
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Papa Vinny joins the Dans to talk about marriage, babies, moving home and the many reasons you shouldn't make a habit of pissing in a Mickey's bottle.
item.itunes:subtitle: Papa Vinny joins the Dans to talk about marriage, babies, moving home and the many reasons you shouldn't make a habit of pissing in a Mickey's bottle.

item.title: Danswers 09: Steffy G
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Actual professional in the field of Danswering and friend of the show Stephanie Golenvaux pops in to to take your questions on sex, loneliness, relationships, dealing with mental health, and how much Dan hates Tool.
item.itunes:subtitle: Actual professional in the field of Danswering and friend of the show Stephanie Golenvaux pops in to to take your questions on sex, loneliness, relationships, dealing with mental health, and how much Dan hates Tool.

item.title: Danswers 10: Paul Ryckert
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: The elder Ryckert joins the Dans to talk about alone time, delivering mail, bringing one of this show's hosts into the world, and his 52nd divorce.
item.itunes:subtitle: The elder Ryckert joins the Dans to talk about alone time, delivering mail, bringing one of this show's hosts into the world, and his 52nd divorce.

item.title: Danswers 11: Tamoor Hussain
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: This week we're joined by GameSpot UK's Tamoor Hussain, to talk about losing weight, cats, Ramadan, islamophobia, dick pics, and much more.
item.itunes:subtitle: This week we're joined by GameSpot UK's Tamoor Hussain, to talk about losing weight, cats, Ramadan, islamophobia, dick pics, and much more.

item.title: Danswers 12: Bradswers
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Brad joins Dan and Danny to talk about drifting friendships, finance struggles, taking relationships slow, crushes with friends, and much more.

item.title: Danswers 13: Jason Danstreicher
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Danny & Dan return from a short break and chat to their friend and colleague Jason Oestreicher about babies, childhood, marriage, moving and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Danny & Dan return from a short break and chat to their friend and colleague Jason Oestreicher about babies, childhood, marriage, moving and more!

item.title: Danswers 14: Brad Muir
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Giant Bomb's life advice podcast returns with a guest who's name is impossible to combine with Dan. But don't fret, Seattle's latest hat salesman comes on to tell us all about having babies, raising babies, and much more.

item.title: Danswers 15: Sadantha Kaldan Returns!
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Friend of the show Samantha Kalman returns to talk to our house-Dans about break-ups, office romance, gender identity and using booze as a tool.
item.itunes:subtitle: Friend of the show Samantha Kalman returns to talk to our house-Dans about break-ups, office romance, gender identity and using booze as a tool.

item.title: Danswers 16: Paul Ryckert
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Danswers' official dad helps us break in the new studio with questions about divorce, gray hair, college life, the L word, bachelor parties and more!
item.itunes:subtitle: Danswers' official dad helps us break in the new studio with questions about divorce, gray hair, college life, the L word, bachelor parties and more!

item.title: Danswers 17: Greg Miller
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: Kinda Funny's Greg Miller joins us for a brand new season to talk about surviving cancer, the elusive work/life balance, and the struggles and rewards of going it alone.
item.itunes:subtitle: Kinda Funny's Greg Miller joins us for a brand new season to talk about surviving cancer, the elusive work/life balance, and the struggles and rewards of going it alone.

item.title: Danswers: Where Are They Now?
item.itunes:author: Giant Bomb
item.description: In the last two and a half years, the Dans have gotten married and moved across the country. Also, one of them procreated. Find out which one on this Danswers reunion!
item.itunes:subtitle: In the last two and a half years, the Dans have gotten married and moved across the country. Also, one of them procreated. Find out which one on this Danswers reunion!
